DOC.brief_title: Translating The GOLD COPD Guidelines Into Primary Care Practice
DOC.detailed_description: This project evaluate translation GOLD ( Global Strategy Diagnosis , Management , Prevention Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ) COPD guideline primary care practice . This study base upon premise inform , activate patient interact prepare , proactive team improve appropriate COPD screening , diagnosis management . During phase I , need assessment evaluate barrier facilitator implementation COPD guideline clinical practice focus group primary care patient provider . Using formative evaluation feedback focus group , three tool develop , refine pilot test . These include : computerized patient activation tool use patient either wait room examination room ; web-based , interactive COPD guideline tool use primary care provider decision support tool point care COPD patient education toolbox use practice team . During phase II , block , randomize design cluster trial perform one year intervention within non-academic primary care practice ( 30 practice ) throughout state Rhode Island southeastern MA . The effectiveness material develop phase I test phase II regard physician performance COPD guideline implementation improvement clinically relevant outcome ( appropriate screening , diagnosis management COPD ) compare usual care . The investigator also examine use patient activation tool -'MyLungAge ' prompt patient talk health care provider regard lung health risk COPD . Products dissemination grant include result focus group barrier facilitator implementation adherence COPD guideline , computerize data collection module quality care assessment regard COPD guideline , refine computerized patient activation tool , enhance web-based COPD interactive guideline tool , tailor academic detailing material , result randomize clinical trial effectiveness tool improve COPD guideline adherence primary care practice .
